Baleen is a filter-feeder system inside the mouths of baleen whales. The baleen 
system works when a whale opens its mouth underwater and the whale takes in 
water. The whale then pushes the water out, and animals such as krill are filtered 
by the baleen and remain as food source for the whale. ... Some whales, such as 
the bowhead whale, have longer baleen than others.
